document_data.name: Funada Toyoo
document_data.mainbody: '''Funada Toyoo''' was the administrator of [[Nakamaru]] around [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Often his brother the daimyo [[Funada Mitsuhide]] was in [[Uwaji]] in attendance to the [[shogun]] and during these times it was Toyoo that ran the city. The two brothers feuded over whether the next daimyo of Nakamaru would be the son of Mistsuhide or the son of Toyoo. Mistuhide was trying to discreetly remove Toyoo from his position as administrator of the town
document_data.Personality: Toyoo was more sly than Mitsuhide but lacked patience, preferring a swift and decisive victory even if at extreme cost.
